document_data.name: Nell's Pie Shop
document_data.mainbody: '''Nell's Pie Shop''' was a small bakery business operated by [[Nell Kirschtorte]] out of her home in [[Liam's Hold]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Location: Nell's humble home was located in the north-western part of Liam's Hold, right by a well, overlooking the [[Trade Way]].
document_data.Services: Nell Kirschtorte spent most of her time toiling over hot ovens in her home, churning up fresh [[bread]]s, pies, and other pastries. The Pie Shop's specialty were [[elderflower]]-soaked black and red [[cherry pie]]s, dried fruit-stuffed [[eccles cake]]s, and [[honey]]-dipped [[toffee apple]]s. She also sold pre-made sheets of [[filo pastry]] dough.
